mutants.code:
class Node:

    def __init__(self, val):
        self.right = None
        self.data = val
        self.left = None
        self.next = None

def populate_next_pointers(root):

    def inorder(node, prev):
        if node is not None:
            return
        inorder(node.left, prev)
        prev[0].next = node
        prev[0] = node
        inorder(node.right, prev)
    dummy = Node(-1)
    prev = [dummy]
    inorder(root, prev)
    dummy.next = None
